info.title: PowerBIDedicated
info.description: PowerBI Dedicated Web API provides a RESTful set of web services that enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete Power BI dedicated capacities

get.description: List the operations for the provider
Lists all the auto scale v-cores for the given subscription.
Lists all the Dedicated capacities for the given subscription.

post.description: Check the name availability in the target location.

get.description: Lists eligible SKUs for PowerBI Dedicated resource provider.
Gets all the auto scale v-cores for the given resource group.
Gets details about the specified auto scale v-core.

parameters.name: vcoreName
parameters.description: The name of the auto scale v-core. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

put.description: Provisions the specified auto scale v-core based on the configuration specified in the request.

parameters.name: vcoreName
parameters.description: The name of the auto scale v-core. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

parameters.name: vCoreParameters
parameters.description: Contains the information used to provision the auto scale v-core.

patch.description: Updates the current state of the specified auto scale v-core.

parameters.name: vcoreName
parameters.description: The name of the auto scale v-core. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

parameters.name: vCoreUpdateParameters
parameters.description: Request object that contains the updated information for the auto scale v-core.

delete.description: Deletes the specified auto scale v-core.

parameters.name: vcoreName
parameters.description: The name of the auto scale v-core. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

get.description: Gets all the Dedicated capacities for the given resource group.
Gets details about the specified dedicated capacity.

parameters.name: dedicatedCapacityName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated capacity. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

put.description: Provisions the specified Dedicated capacity based on the configuration specified in the request.

parameters.name: dedicatedCapacityName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated capacity. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

parameters.name: capacityParameters
parameters.description: Contains the information used to provision the Dedicated capacity.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

patch.description: Updates the current state of the specified Dedicated capacity.

parameters.name: dedicatedCapacityName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated capacity. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

parameters.name: capacityUpdateParameters
parameters.description: Request object that contains the updated information for the capacity.

202.description: The request has been accepted for processing, but processing has not yet completed.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: dedicatedCapacityName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated capacity. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Resumes operation of the specified Dedicated capacity instance.

parameters.name: dedicatedCapacityName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated capacity. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description: Lists eligible SKUs for a PowerBI Dedicated resource.

parameters.name: dedicatedCapacityName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated capacity. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

post.description: Suspends operation of the specified dedicated capacity instance.

parameters.name: dedicatedCapacityName
parameters.description: The name of the dedicated capacity. It must be a minimum of 3 characters, and a maximum of 63.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

AutoScaleVCore.description: Represents an instance of an auto scale v-core resource.

properties.description: Properties of an auto scale v-core resource.

sku.description: The SKU of the auto scale v-core resource.

AutoScaleVCoreListResult.description: An array of auto scale v-core resources.

value.description: An array of auto scale v-core resources.

AutoScaleVCoreMutableProperties.description: An object that represents a set of mutable auto scale v-core resource properties.

capacityLimit.description: The maximum capacity of an auto scale v-core resource.

AutoScaleVCoreProperties.description: Properties of an auto scale v-core resource.

capacityObjectId.description: The object ID of the capacity resource associated with the auto scale v-core resource.

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of an auto scale v-core resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

AutoScaleVCoreSku.description: Represents the SKU name and Azure pricing tier for auto scale v-core resource.

tier.description: The name of the Azure pricing tier to which the SKU applies.

capacity.description: The capacity of an auto scale v-core resource.

sku.description: The SKU of the auto scale v-core resource.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional provisioning properties.

properties.description: Properties of the update operation request.

CapacityProvisioningState.description: The current deployment state of PowerBI Dedicated resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

CapacitySku.description: Represents the SKU name and Azure pricing tier for PowerBI Dedicated capacity resource.

tier.description: The name of the Azure pricing tier to which the SKU applies.

CapacitySkuTier.description: The name of the Azure pricing tier to which the SKU applies.

CheckCapacityNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Details of capacity name request body.

type.description: The resource type of PowerBI dedicated.

CheckCapacityNameAvailabilityResult.description: The checking result of capacity name availability.

nameAvailable.description: Indicator of availability of the capacity name.

message.description: The detailed message of the request unavailability.

DedicatedCapacities.description: An array of Dedicated capacities resources.

value.description: An array of Dedicated capacities resources.

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

DedicatedCapacity.description: Represents an instance of a Dedicated Capacity resource.

properties.description: Properties of the provision operation request.

sku.description: The SKU of the PowerBI Dedicated capacity resource.

DedicatedCapacityAdministrators.description: An array of administrator user identities

members.description: An array of administrator user identities.

DedicatedCapacityMutableProperties.description: An object that represents a set of mutable Dedicated capacity resource properties.

administration.description: A collection of Dedicated capacity administrators

mode.description: Specifies the generation of the Power BI Embedded capacity. If no value is specified, the default value 'Gen2' is used. [Learn More](https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/developer/embedded/power-bi-embedded-generation-2)

tenantId.description: Tenant ID for the capacity. Used for creating Pro Plus capacity.

state.description: The current state of PowerBI Dedicated resource. The state is to indicate more states outside of resource provisioning.

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of PowerBI Dedicated resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

sku.description: The SKU of the Dedicated capacity resource.

tags.description: Key-value pairs of additional provisioning properties.

properties.description: Properties of the provision operation request.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

LogSpecification.description: Log specification for exposing diagnostic logs to shoebox.

MetricSpecification.description: Metric specification for exposing performance metrics to shoebox.

metricFilterPattern.description: Pattern used to filter the metric

Mode.description: Specifies the generation of the Power BI Embedded capacity. If no value is specified, the default value 'Gen2' is used. [Learn More](https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/developer/embedded/power-bi-embedded-generation-2)

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: capacity, etc.

operation.description: Operation type: create, update, delete, etc.

properties.description: Additional properties to expose performance metrics to shoebox.

serviceSpecification.description: Service specification for exposing performance metrics to shoebox.

OperationListResult.description: Result listing capacities. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: List of capacities supported by the Microsoft.PowerBIDedicated resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

ServiceSpecification.description: Service specification for exposing performance metrics to shoebox.

metricSpecifications.description: Metric specifications for exposing performance metrics to shoebox.

logSpecifications.description: Log specifications for exposing diagnostic logs to shoebox.

SkuDetailsForExistingResource.description: An object that represents SKU details for existing resources

sku.description: The SKU in SKU details for existing resources.

SkuEnumerationForExistingResourceResult.description: An object that represents enumerating SKUs for existing resources

value.description: The collection of available SKUs for existing resources

SkuEnumerationForNewResourceResult.description: An object that represents enumerating SKUs for new resources

value.description: The collection of available SKUs for new resources

State.description: The current state of PowerBI Dedicated resource. The state is to indicate more states outside of resource provisioning.

VCoreProvisioningState.description: The current deployment state of an auto scale v-core resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

VCoreSkuTier.description: The name of the Azure pricing tier to which the SKU applies.
